article_title: How Much Is Medicaid Really Worth?

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: One of the most important components of ObamaCare is the expansion of Medicaid. In those states that have done it, the cost to taxpayers runs into billions of dollars. But is this expenditure worthwhile? What if instead of giving people Medicaid insurance, we offered them cash? A new study says [...]
